column1: '''Swertings''' is a name referring to the [[Haradrim]]. The word was [[Hobbitish]], used among the [[Hobbits]] of the secluded [[the Shire
column2: Shire]]. Only legends about them reached the Hobbits: the Swertings lived in the [[Sunlands]] and rode to war on [[oliphaunts]].<ref>{{TT

column1: ''Swerting'' is a word related to the term '[[Swarthy Men]]' used in the [[Westron
column2: Common Speech]] (where 'swarthy' is an old word for 'dark-skinned').<ref>{{TT
Swerting]] is an [[Old English]] name, referring to a legendary character, also mentioned in ''[[Beowulf (poem)
